results.title: Severe rhabdomyolysis and acute renal failure secondary to the use of simvastatin in undiagnosed hypothyroidism
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was taking 80 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (initiated 20 days before) after cardiac catheterization for an @<m>DISEASE_Inferior_Wall_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056989 @@@inferior myocardial infarction@@@.

citations.NLM: Qari FA. Severe rhabdomyolysis and acute renal failure secondary to the use of simvastatin in undiagnosed hypothyroidism Indian J Nephrol. 2008 Jan;18(1):28-9. PMID: 20368919

results.title: Severe rhabdomyolysis and acute renal failure secondary to use of simvastatin in undiagnosed hypothyroidism.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was taking 80 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ initiated 20 days earlier after cardiac catheterization for an @<m>DISEASE_Inferior_Wall_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056989 @@@inferior myocardial infarction@@@.

citations.NLM: Qari FA. Severe rhabdomyolysis and acute renal failure secondary to use of simvastatin in undiagnosed hypothyroidism. Saudi J Kidney Dis Transpl. 2009 Jan;20(1):127-9. PMID: 19112232
citations.BibTeX: @article{19112232, title={Severe rhabdomyolysis and acute renal failure secondary to use of simvastatin in undiagnosed hypothyroidism.}, author={Qari FA}, journal={Saudi J Kidney Dis Transpl}, volume={20}, number={1}, pages={127-9}}

results.title: [Statins in dyslipidemia associated with acute myocardial infarct].
results.text_hl: On the basis of the obtained results and up to now studies on statins effects we suggest @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@Atorvastatin@@@ for treatment the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Anterior_Wall_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D056988 @@@anterior myocardial infarction@@@, increased LDL with normal values of HDL and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ for treatment the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Inferior_Wall_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056989 @@@inferior myocardial infarction@@@, decreased HDL.

citations.NLM: Smajić E, Kusljugić Z, Baraković F, Divković K, Hukić-Suljkanović N, Mrsić D, Hujdurović S. [Statins in dyslipidemia associated with acute myocardial infarct]. Med Arh. 2004;58(2 Suppl 1):21-3. PMID: 15202301
